nav.div: Salina Public Schools | USD 305 » Continuous Learning » Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) » Meals Available

ul.li: No signup, eligibility, or paperwork required.
Children must be present per federal government (USDA) requirements.
Visit any site regardless of school attended.

div.div: Drive-thru distribution of meals from seven school sites:

Locate a Site Near You:
https://www.fns.usda.gov/meals4kids
In the event of severe weather (severe weather warning), the meal sites will close.

div.em: These sites were selected in accordance with federal government (USDA) guidelines. This institution is an equal opportunity provider. Please continue to check our website, usd305.com, for meal schedule updates.

div.h3: Salina Public Schools1511 Gypsum Street, Salina, KS 67401p: 785-309-4700 | f: 785-309-4737

div.div: Learning for All... Whatever it Takes!
